headline: 2 dead after military jet crashes near airport in Alabama
summary: Two people are dead after a military jet crashed near an Alabama airport Friday evening, officials said.

summary: With his return to the DOJ as attorney general, Merrick Garland faces a far more daunting domestic terror crisis than at any point in American history, experts say.

headline: Biden to announce changes to PPP loan program, with focus on smallest businesses

headline: Family of 11-year-old boy who died in Texas deep freeze files $100 million suit against power companies
summary: The family of 11-year-old Cristian Pineda, who died in his Texas home after the power was cut off, has filed $100M suit against power companies

headline: 10 rescued after becoming stranded on ice floes in Lake Erie, Coast Guard says
summary: Ten people were rescued from sheets of ice floating on Lake Erie on Sunday afternoon.

headline: Fauci on COVID-19 fight: US has 'done worse than most any other country'
summary: As the United States nears 500,000 COVID-19 deaths, Dr. Anthony Fauci told "Good Morning America" Monday that the U.S. has “done worse than any other country."

headline: Italian ambassador killed in attack on UN convoy in Democratic Republic of Congo, officials say
summary: Italy's ambassador to the Democratic Republic of Congo, Luca Attanasio, was killed Monday in an attack on a United Nations convoy during a field visit in the country.

headline: 1 more hit of wintry weather before spring-like conditions for Eastern US
summary: Finally, after weeks of the coldest weather in decades for the South and parts of Midwest, its feeling like Spring.
